# DEPARTMENT OF STATE TELEGRAM
**UNCLASSIFIED**

Unclas La Paz 9738

E.O. 12065: N/A
Tags: SNAR
Subject: Narcotics Control: Commodity Requirement

Ref: (A) State 290615, (B) Lopez-Perry memo of 8/13/79

Referenced course was scheduled for October 1979, but relevant materials have not arrived. It was tentatively rescheduled for January 1980, provided materials arrive. However, in view of political situation in Bolivia, course should be held in abeyance. If materials are sent, they should be charged against PDS account 19-1191022.2/3104/903406.
Boeker
